name: dvops-part1
description: This is a repository for the DVOPS Project

scripts.frontend-instrument: nyc instrument .\public\js .\public\instrumented\js && copy .\public\.html .\public\instrumented\ && copy .\public\images.\public\instrumented\ && copy .\public\css .\public\instrumented\ && del.\coverage-frontend\.json
scripts.frontend-report: nyc report --reporter html --reporter text -t coverage-frontend --report-dir coverage-frontend/summary
